definition: Amitabha, the Buddha of the Western Paradise/abbr. for 阿彌陀佛|阿弥陀佛/Mituo or Mito township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
full/to fill/completely/more
brimming or overflowing
(phonetic)/declivity/steep bank
Amitabha Buddha/the Buddha of the Western paradise/may the lord Buddha preserve us!/merciful Buddha!
Mituo or Mito township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
Amitabha, Buddha of infinite light

sentences.english: If there are living beings who wish to see Amitabha Buddha in this lifetime.
sentences.chinese: 其有众生欲于今世见阿弥陀佛者。

sentences.english: Right is Western world Amida Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 右为西方世界阿弥陀佛。

sentences.english: Amitabha Buddha emitted uncountable lights from his palm which pervasively illuminated all the Buddhalands.
sentences.chinese: 阿弥陀佛即于掌中放无量光，普照一切诸佛世界。

sentences.english: This is what the Blessed One said.
sentences.chinese: 这就是《佛说阿弥陀经》的讲说因缘。

sentences.english: Such people have no intention of thrusting themselves entirely to Amida.
sentences.chinese: 这样的人是没有意图将他们自己完全信任给阿弥陀佛。

sentences.english: A small niche in the rear houses Amitabha of Sukhavati (Land of Ultimate Bliss).
sentences.chinese: 后面小洞内供西方极乐世界阿弥陀佛。

sentences.english: In this land a Buddha called Amitabha right now teaches the Dharma.
sentences.chinese: 其土有佛，号阿弥陀，今现在说法。

sentences.english: And just prepare to go back to your home, your father Amida Buddha's home.
sentences.chinese: 只需要准备好回家，你的慈父阿弥陀佛的家。

sentences.english: All these birds are the creations of Amitabha Buddha, fashioned in order to broadcast the sounds of the Dharma.
sentences.chinese: 是诸众鸟，皆是阿弥陀佛欲令法音宣流，变化所作。

sentences.english: But the lights of Amitabha Buddha pervasively illuminate uncountable, immeasurable, innumerable Buddhalands.
sentences.chinese: 惟阿弥陀佛，光明普照无量无边无数佛刹。

sentences.english: And, Shariputra, since Amitabha realized Buddhahood, ten kalpas have passed.
sentences.chinese: 舍利弗，阿弥陀佛成佛以来，于今十劫。

sentences.english: Amitabha is the most ancient Buddha among the Dhyani buddhas.
sentences.chinese: 阿弥陀佛是禅那佛中最年长的一位。

sentences.english: Amitabha Buddha is one of the five meditating Buddhas.
sentences.chinese: 阿弥陀佛是五方佛之一。

sentences.english: Thee next discourse I read was What Kind of Buddha Is Amitabha?
sentences.chinese: 我读到的第二篇文章是《阿弥陀佛是怎样一尊佛》。

sentences.english: Because of the ultimately pure, bright light from Amitabha Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 以阿弥陀佛殊胜光明，极清净故。

sentences.english: Who hear the Name of Amitabha Buddha .

definition: Western Pure Land of Ultimate Bliss or Sukhavati (Sanskrit)
pinyin: xi1 fang1 ji2 le4 shi4 jie4

definition: Amitabha Buddha/the Buddha of the Western paradise/may the lord Buddha preserve us!/merciful Buddha!
Kṣitigarbha Bodhisattva, the Bodhisattva of the Great Vow (to save all souls before accepting Bodhi)/also translated Earth Treasury, Earth Womb, or Earth Store Bodhisattva
boundless life (expression of good wishes)/Amitayus, the Buddha of measureless life, good fortune and wisdom
Buddha/Buddhism
(female) head ornament/variant of 彿|佛[fu2]
seemingly
Guanyin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion or Goddess of Mercy (Sanskrit Avalokiteśvara)
one of the many names of Buddha
one who surmounts all obstacles (Buddhism)
Medicine Buddha (Sanskrit: Bhaisajyaguru)
to be reborn/to live in paradise (Buddhism)/to die/(after) one's death
Kṣitigarbha Bodhisattva, the Bodhisattva of the Great Vow (to save all souls before accepting Bodhi)/also translated Earth Treasury, Earth Womb, or Earth Store Bodhisattva
Medicine Buddha (Sanskrit: Bhaisajyaguru)
to extinguish worries and the sea of grief/nirvana (Buddhism)
Bodhisattva (Buddhism)
Manjushri, the Bodhisattva of keen awareness
pinyin: Wen2 shu1 shi1 li4 Pu2 sa4

definition: Buddha (a person who has attained Buddhahood, or specifically Siddhartha Gautama)
